column5: Seems like ice just went out recently.  Surface temps this afternoon 72-75F ?
Was out on my hole lake last weekend.  Saturday it was 60F.  Sunday late morning it was 70F!  Couldn’t believe how quickly it rose!
I saw 77 in a back bay when looking for crappie.  Craziness.
77 yesterday on rice and the fish were CHOMPIN!  S.

That happens here all the time. Last time I did a trip to the East Arm of Great Slave Lake the surface water temp on the first day was 39 degrees. After 2 days of calm and sun it was 70+ degrees. Only goes down a few inches that early in the season though.
No real idea what the outdoor temps have been like up there, but they have been pretty brutal here, already a few records broken with 90+ degree days.
68 deg this morning out there. Jig brought up from 100 fow and piss warm. Crazy warm up. To fast.
and the lakers will be in less than 12 FOW.......yeeehawww!

wind flipped the water this weekend, back down to 62 saturday morning. Theres definitely a hard thermocline right now at about 8 fow it kept marking it on the chirp but nothing on the DI. kinda wild to pick it up so much so shallow.
